name: com.android.shell.BugreportProgressService
description:
Service used to trigger system bugreports. The workflow uses Bugreport API(@code BugreportManager) and is as follows:
  1. System apps like Settings or SysUI broadcasts @code BUGREPORT_REQUESTED.
  2. BugreportRequestedReceiver receives the intent and delegates it to this service.
  3. This service calls startBugreport() and passes in local file descriptors to receive bugreport artifacts.
